Package com.analog.lyric.dimple.solvers.gibbs

Gibbs sampler based solver.

See: Description

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    ISolverFactorGibbs  
    ISolverNodeGibbs  
    ISolverRealVariableGibbs  
    ISolverVariableGibbs  
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    GibbsDiscrete
    Solver variable for Discrete variables in Gibbs solver.
    GibbsNeighbors
    Represents the neighbors of a ISolverVariableGibbs that need to be included in the variable's sample score.
    GibbsOptions
    Options for Gibbs solver.
    GibbsReal
    Real-valued solver variable for Gibbs solver.
    GibbsRealFactor
    Real solver factor under Gibbs solver.
    GibbsRealFactorBlastFromThePast
    Real "blast from the past" factor for Gibbs solver.
    GibbsRealJoint
    RealJoint-valued solver variable for Gibbs solver.
    GibbsScoredVariableUpdateEvent
    Gibbs variable update event that includes sample scores.
    GibbsSolver  
    GibbsSolverGraph
    Solver-specific factor graph for Gibbs solver.
    GibbsSolverVariableEvent  
    GibbsTableFactor
    Solver table factor for Gibbs solver.
    GibbsTableFactorBlastFromThePast  
    GibbsVariableUpdateEvent
    Event raised when variable sample is changed by Gibbs solver.
    SDiscreteVariable Deprecated
    Use GibbsDiscrete instead.
    SFactorGraph Deprecated
    Will be removed in future release.
    SFactorGraph.Arguments Deprecated
    set corresponding GibbsOptions using setOption on graph instead of using this class to configure Gibbs solver.
    SFactorUpdate  
    Solver  
    SRealFactor Deprecated
    Use GibbsRealFactor instead.
    SRealJointVariable Deprecated
    Use GibbsRealJoint instead.
    SRealVariable Deprecated
    Use GibbsReal instead.
    STableFactor Deprecated
    Use GibbsTableFactor instead.
